original_text: He brought the people out from the city to do hard work for him. He made them cut wood with saws, and use iron tools and axes. He also made them work at the brick ovens. He did the same thing to the people of all the other Ammonite cities.
korean_text: 그 안에 있는 백성들을 끌어내어 톱질과 써레질과 철도끼질과 벽돌구이를 그들에게 하게 하니라 암몬 자손의 모든 성읍을 이같이 하고 다윗과 모든 백성이 예루살렘으로 돌아가니라

sentences.original_text: He brought the people out from the city
to do hard work for him
He made them cut wood with saws
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 톱으로 나무를 자르게 했다

sentences.original_text: and use iron tools and axes
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 쇠 도구와 도끼를 사용하게 했다

sentences.original_text: He also made them work at the brick ovens
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 그들이 벽돌 가마에서 일하게 했다

sentences.original_text: He did the same thing to the people
of all the other Ammonite cities
